mapper.sql: salary_id, salary_template_id, person_id, status, salary_memo, usage_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into ehr_salary
salary_id,
salary_template_id,
person_id,
status,
salary_memo,
usage_flag,
#{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{salaryTemplateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{salaryMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{usageFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ehr_salary
salary_template_id = #{salaryTemplateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
salary_memo = #{salaryMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usage_flag = #{usageFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where salary_id = #{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ehr_salary set salary_template_id = #{salaryTemplateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary_memo = #{salaryMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usage_flag = #{usageFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where salary_id = #{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select s.*,p.employee_name,p.job_number,p.cert_id,t.template_name from ehr_salary s left join ehr_person p on s.person_id=p.person_id left join ehr_salary_template t on s.salary_template_id=t.salary_template_id where p.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and s.salary_id=#{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
